full_threads.body:
Hi Leila, 

These were not from the same IP, so we have blocked both. 

Can you please add heath@wolfiq.com.au to you Stripe account. There are some security features we may be able to enable to help with this.

Hi Heath

We feel below orders are un-usual. Could you please see if they are same IP? Can you block this IP address?

Hi heath

We not get your reply yet .
Can you check this action? Can you block them?

Leila Cui

Hi There

There is credit card theft action again at La cosmetique website see attached photo. Are there any action we can do before them?

That is unacceptable and very annoying.

Yours Sincerely,

Kevin Yu



SilverWestern Pty Ltd / JR Moomi Trading Pty Ltd

Mobile: +61 410 888 299

Email: kevin@lacosmetique.com.au

Hi Leila,

There is not much that can be done. Ultimately, if someones credit card details have been stolen, then this can happen.

Stripe does have some built in security called 'Radar'. As you can see from your screen shot, it managed to block some of the fraudulent payments, but this one got through.

If you suspect a payment, it's probably best to call the customer to verify the order instead of shipping to them. This way to don't loose as much.

I'm sorry I can't help further on this one. It's not a matter of the websites security level, it was just someone trying to purchase with stolen credit card details by the looks of it.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Heath, and wp perk team

This transaction of below IP address user they use fraudulent card. so the fund been recalled and we have pay 25 dispute fee.

Please advise this situation and how we improve the website security level?? See below images.

And I believe they have 2 transactions successful paid but now one already been report. In this case where we can report? We already post the parcels.

Hi Lelia, 

Yes, I would call her to find out if it's a real order and then go from there.

Hi Heath

But she has few orders successful paid.
Is that means we still have to ship the product? Do we need call her?

Best regards

Leila
@rica 15mins then ok to close. Thanks

Hi Meg and Leila, 

We have blocked the IP addresses that this person is using, so they won't be able to access the website again, assuming they are using the same device. Let's see how it goes?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

Is there any way we can stop this person from placing order on our website? He keeps using different names and email address to place order. Most orders were failed but 2 orders were successful.

Please have a look! Thanks!
